name: Hemingway Days
short_description: The 37th annual celebration of the legendary author’s work and lifestyle features literary readings,
long_description: The 37th annual celebration of the legendary author’s work and lifestyle features literary readings, the Running of the Bulls, a short story competition, fishing tournament, 5k Run and Paddleboard Race, Sloppy Joe’s Look-Alike Contest and a birthday “party” commemorating Ernest’s July 21st birthday.
